title: pixel 2xl wont turn on
content: my pixel 2xl suddenly turn of when i plug it to charge. the battery is at 16% when i plug in but suddenly it switch of and not turning on. i tried force restart by pressing continue power for 30 sec and also tried to boot into bootloader menu by pressing power key and volume down key but still no response. i thought there is no power left so i charge mobile for 3..4 hr and tried after but still it wont turning on.
